name: participation
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the fact that you take part or become involved in something
Examples
Your participation in this investigation is vital.Full participation by all members is compulsory.It would be encouraging to see participation by all age groups.A leg injury is preventing him from active participation in the competition.His participation in religious activities was seized upon by the media.
